ModMetaData.name: RePower Ceramics Patch
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Patches Ceramics benches for using the RePower system:
Electric ceramics bench (10W Idle, 400W Active) Electric kiln (10W Idle, 600W Active) Materials processing bench (10W Idle, 700W Active)
Support-chat here: https://s.team/chat/KUDuzMGR
